name: Mini World Adventures
description:
Mini World Adventures. A very traditional top-down RPG. This is the first public playtesting demo. 

Explore, solve puzzles, defeat monsters, find the pieces of the Robot to save him.

Full game will be free.

Game has support for English, German and Turkish.

Windows is only there for people who really want it. Controls and UI is currently not optimized for Keyboard & Mouse. (full game will be)

If you have any feedback, suggestions, or bugs for me to fix, please let me know! I'd really appreciate it!
